response.overview: Evan (22 years old) developed MDD after breaking off a relationship that he had been in for years with an amateur artist and celebrity named Kirana (20 years old). Evan broke off the relationship due to many considerations. Kirana's mother (45 years old) did not approve of their relationship. Kirana has also been matched with Rangga (23 years old), a businessman's son whose life is already established, compared to Evan who is a sandwich generation.  One day Evan takes Kirana to a psychologist to consult on their relationship that is almost on the level of marriage. This is where Evan realizes that Kirana who he has been holding and talking to all this time is just his imagination after being made aware by the psychologist handling his case.
response.title: Lost in Memories
